|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD hEX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB750Gr3 |page_start_date = 10/25/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/MikroTik_RouterBOARD_hEX_v3_(RB750Gr3) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 48RGEM02.0GALPC |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:3B:6B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;Level 4;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = ns |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.38 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2016 |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48RGEM02.0GALPC", "MikroTik hEX v3" and "1633" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Wistron NeWeb|MikroTik}}

===Forum threads=== * [http://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=113068 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB750Gr3'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] :[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX v3 (RB750Gr3)]] - ''Gigabit Ethernet Router'' :[http://routerboard.com/RB750Gr3 RB750Gr3] ('''hEX v3''') - 5x GbE ports, 16/256MB, RouterOS L4 (6.36.1) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core (MIPS 1004Kc V2.15) :1x USB 2.0, microSD Card slot, Flash (SPI), RAM Nanya (DDR3) :OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=6C:3B:6B 6C:3B:6B], "48RGEM02.0GALPC", "1633" ([[WNC]]) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61633-58 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB750Gr3'' on '''iXBT''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-obnovlennogo-Mikrotik-hEX-RB750Gr3:-luchshiy-marshrutizator-po-sootnosheniyu-cena-kachestvo Review on '''LanMarket'''] *[http://weblance.com.ua/280-obzor-marshrutizatora-mikrotik-hex-rev3-rb750gr3-apparatnyy-ipsec-moschnyy-dvuyadernyy-processor-256-mb-operativki-i-podderzhka-dude-server.html Review on '''WebLance''']

==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M11 (RBM11G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/m11g Product page] :Powerful small size OEM board with one GbE LAN and one miniPCIe slot :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), 3G/LTE modem supports :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 1x GbE LAN, 1x PCIe, 1x Mini SIM Card slot *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M33 (RBM33G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/rbm33g Product page] :Powerful OEM board with three GbE LAN and two miniPCIe slots :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), USB 3.0, M.2 (Key M) :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 3x GbE LAN, 2x PCIe, 2x Mini SIM Card slot
